amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 116-264 states that regarding the Curecanti National Recreation Area, nothing in this Act constitutes an express or implied Federal reservation of any water or water rights.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Tipton.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
